attributes.action: Hold a referendum on abolishing the house of lords
attributes.additional_details: You cannot make a deal by showing people all your cards before you made it. If you do you will end up with the worst deal ever.
attributes.background: And replace them from people that has been on less than £12.000 a year for more than 5 years including the unemployed.To stop the un elected house of lords voting on agenda that helps their political parties and hinders the will of the people.
